verbose_text: However, resveratrol (5, 10 or 20 muM) significantly prevented A/R induced cell damage in cardiomyocytes confirmed by improved cell viability and reduced LDH activity, implying that resveratrol can protect cardiomyocytes.
evidence: resveratrol (5, 10 or 20 muM) significantly prevented A/R-induced cell damage in cardiomyocytes confirmed by improved cell viability and reduced LDH
